Package entity.player

Class AIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.player.Player
      • entity.player.AIPlayer
  • public class AIPlayer
extends Player
    Player that uses a provided strategy for deciding the next moves on the board. Also, the AI player takes its name from the strategy that is being assigned to it.
    Author:
    Aliaksei Kouzel
